subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Manu Ginobili scored 21 points off the bench and Tim Duncan had 14 points and 17 rebounds to lead the slow-starting San Antonio Spurs to a victory against the Nets.
snippet: Manu Ginobili scored 21 points off the bench and Tim Duncan had 14 points and 17 rebounds to lead the slow-starting San Antonio Spurs to a victory against the Nets.
